leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

unit.unit_name: 可解释性与归因/突变扫描

tools.name: Iterative_masking
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative masking algorithm on MSA Transformer for synthetic sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm that uses iterative masking on MSA Transformers to generate synthetic protein sequences, useful for data augmentation and evolutionary modeling.

tools.name: CDMetaPOP
tools.one_line_profile: Individual-based eco-evolutionary model for landscape demogenetics
tools.detailed_description: A spatially-explicit simulation tool for modeling population viability and genetics in complex landscapes, tracking individual eco-evolutionary dynamics.

tools.name: bio-datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of biological datasets and embeddings loaders
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to simplify the access and loading of various biological datasets and pre-computed protein embeddings for machine learning tasks.

tools.name: bio-transformers
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for protein language models to generate embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper library built on top of ESM and ProtBert models to facilitate the generation of protein embeddings for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: S3F
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-Structure-Surface Model for Protein Fitness Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that integrates sequence, structure, and surface features to predict protein fitness and mutational effects.

tools.name: mutatex
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for in-silico mutagenesis using FoldX
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and pipeline for automating in-silico mutagenesis experiments and stability calculations using the FoldX force field.

tools.name: InterPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretability framework for Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for discovering interpretable features in protein language models using sparse autoencoders, aiding in the understanding of model representations.

tools.name: Enrich2
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for deep mutational scanning experiments
tools.detailed_description: A software package for processing, analyzing, and visualizing data from deep mutational scanning (DMS) experiments to calculate enrichment ratios.

tools.name: Envision
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor of protein variant molecular effects
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning model trained on large-scale experimental mutagenesis data to predict the molecular effects of protein variants.

tools.name: Selene
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for sequence-level deep learning in genomics
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework designed for developing, training, and evaluating deep learning models on biological sequence data.

tools.name: protein-localization
tools.one_line_profile: Subcellular localization prediction using Transformer embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A model utilizing Transformer-based protein embeddings and linear attention mechanisms to predict the subcellular localization of proteins.

tools.name: Hierarchical Importance Attribution
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical explanation for neural sequence models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of hierarchical importance attribution methods to explain compositional semantics and feature importance in neural sequence models.

tools.name: LucaVirus
tools.one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for viruses
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for modeling the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses, utilizing both genome and protein information.

tools.name: PyMissense
tools.one_line_profile: Pathogenicity plot and PDB visualization for AlphaMissense
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate pathogenicity plots and map AlphaMissense predictions onto PDB structures for custom proteins.

tools.name: Lomap
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical mutation scoring map for free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to plan relative free energy calculations by constructing a graph of alchemical mutations between ligands.

tools.name: dms-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for DMS data quantification
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for processing paired-end reads from deep mutational scanning experiments to quantify variants.

tools.name: ProteinGym
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for protein fitness prediction and design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite and platform for evaluating protein fitness prediction models and design algorithms.

tools.name: Tranception
tools.one_line_profile: Protein fitness prediction with autoregressive transformers
tools.detailed_description: A model for predicting protein fitness using autoregressive transformers and inference-time retrieval mechanisms.

tools.name: Lomap (OpenFreeEnergy)
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical mutation scoring map (OpenFreeEnergy fork)
tools.detailed_description: A maintained version of Lomap for planning alchemical relative free energy calculations in drug discovery.

tools.name: ProLLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for Multi-Task Processing
tools.detailed_description: A protein large language model adapted from LLaMA, capable of handling multiple protein language processing tasks.

tools.name: ProteinGym/proteingym-base
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure and data classes for protein variant effect prediction benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A foundational library for the ProteinGym benchmark, providing data classes to combine assays, sequences, MSAs, and structures into coherent packages, along with model cards for supervised and zero-shot ML models in variant effect prediction.

tools.name: ProteinGym/proteingym-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark suite for protein variant effect prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of variant effect prediction models and a DVC-based pipeline to perform benchmarking experiments against ProteinGym datasets. Includes a webapp for listing model performance.

tools.name: VESPA
tools.one_line_profile: Single Amino Acid Variant effect predictor using ProtT5 embeddings
tools.detailed_description: VESPA (Variant Effect Score Prediction using All-embeddings) is a predictor for Single Amino Acid Variant (SAV) effects, leveraging embeddings from the Protein Language Model ProtT5 to assess functional impacts.

tools.name: protPheMut
tools.one_line_profile: ML and graph-based tool for scoring missense mutations to phenotypes
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing machine learning and graph-based approaches to provide indicators and scores for linking missense mutations to specific phenotypes.

tools.name: Pythia
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based predictor for protein stability changes upon mutation
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based self-supervised learning tool that enables ultrafast prediction of thermodynamic stability changes (Delta Delta G) caused by protein mutations.

tools.name: DISAE
tools.one_line_profile: MSA-regularized transformer for predicting chemical-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: A protein sequence transformer model regularized by Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSA) designed to predict genome-wide chemical-protein interactions, with applications in GPCR deorphanization.

tools.name: Maverick
tools.one_line_profile: Mendelian approach to variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based deep learning tool for predicting the effects of genetic variants, utilizing a Mendelian approach to assess pathogenicity.

tools.name: VenusFSFP
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot protein fitness prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning model designed for few-shot prediction of protein fitness landscapes, enabling accurate predictions with limited labeled data.

tools.name: VenusREM
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-augmented zero-shot mutant prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that augments zero-shot mutant effect prediction by using retrieval-based logits fusion, improving accuracy in assessing protein variants.

tools.name: metapointfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for finding and scoring resistance-causing mutations in long reads
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool designed to identify and score mutations that cause resistance, specifically tailored for analyzing long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: VaLiAnT
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Library Annotation Tool for Deep Mutational Scanning
tools.detailed_description: VaLiAnT (Variant Library Annotation Tool) is designed for the design and annotation of oligonucleotide libraries used in Saturation Genome Editing and Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) experiments.

tools.name: SUsPECT
tools.one_line_profile: Variant effect prediction pipeline using custom long-read transcriptomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for predicting the effects of variants by leveraging custom long-read transcriptome data, enabling more accurate assessment in specific genomic contexts.

tools.name: DeepSequence
tools.one_line_profile: Generative latent variable model for biological sequence families
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model that learns the latent structure of biological sequence families, widely used for predicting the effects of mutations based on evolutionary information.

tools.name: SeqDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autoregressive generative models for protein design and variant prediction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for protein design and variant effect prediction utilizing autoregressive generative models to capture sequence dependencies.

tools.name: dms-vep-pipeline-3
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing deep mutational scanning of viral entry proteins
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive analysis pipeline specifically designed for processing and interpreting Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) data of viral entry proteins.

tools.name: HyPepTox-Fuse
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid framework for peptide toxicity prediction using PLM embeddings
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable hybrid framework that accurately predicts peptide toxicity by fusing embeddings from protein language models with conventional physicochemical descriptors.

tools.name: mutmatch
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for estimating somatic gene selection and epistasis
tools.detailed_description: A statistical tool for estimating somatic gene selection and epistasis by analyzing neighboring gene mutation rates and CADD scores, focusing on low-impact mutations.

tools.name: interprot
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Autoencoders for interpreting protein language model features
tools.detailed_description: A library to train and evaluate Sparse Autoencoders (SAEs) aimed at identifying interpretable features within Protein Language Models (pLMs), facilitating scientific discovery in protein representation learning.

tools.name: DeepFRI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for protein function prediction using graph convolutional networks
tools.detailed_description: DeepFRI (Deep Functional Residue Identification) is a Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) based method for predicting protein functions by leveraging sequence and structure features. It provides interpretable predictions by identifying key residues (saliency maps) responsible for specific functions.

tools.name: mutscan
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing and visualizing Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) data
tools.detailed_description: mutscan is a software tool designed to process, statistically analyze, and visualize data from Deep Mutational Scanning experiments. It facilitates the understanding of how mutations affect protein function through comprehensive data handling pipelines.

tools.name: MMSplice / MTSplice
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting effects of genetic variants on splicing
tools.detailed_description: MMSplice (Modular Modeling of Splicing) and MTSplice predict the effects of variants on exon skipping, splice site choice, and splicing efficiency. It uses neural networks to model splicing regulation and can predict tissue-specific effects.

tools.name: nn4dms
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for modeling Deep Mutational Scanning data
tools.detailed_description: nn4dms provides neural network architectures and training pipelines specifically designed for analyzing Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) datasets, enabling the mapping of sequence variants to functional scores.

tools.name: metalic
tools.one_line_profile: Meta in-context learning for protein fitness prediction
tools.detailed_description: Metalic is a framework for protein fitness prediction using meta-learning and in-context learning approaches. It allows for few-shot prediction of protein properties based on limited data.

tools.name: dms_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of Deep Mutational Scanning data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing, analyzing, and visualizing data from deep mutational scanning experiments. It handles sequencing data alignment, counting, and calculation of differential selection.

tools.name: dms_tools2
tools.one_line_profile: Successor to dms_tools for Deep Mutational Scanning analysis
tools.detailed_description: The second version of dms_tools, providing improved pipelines for the analysis and visualization of deep mutational scanning data, including support for barcoded sequencing data.

tools.name: dms_variants
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of deep mutational scanning of barcoded variants
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to analyze deep mutational scanning experiments that use barcoded variants, facilitating the mapping of barcodes to variants and counting.

tools.name: dmslogo
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence logos for Deep Mutational Scanning data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to draw sequence logos that are specifically tailored to visualize the results of deep mutational scanning experiments, such as amino acid preferences or differential selection.

tools.name: phydms
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic analyses informed by Deep Mutational Scanning
tools.detailed_description: phydms uses data from deep mutational scanning experiments to inform phylogenetic substitution models, allowing for more accurate modeling of protein evolution and selection pressures.

tools.name: kipoi-veff
tools.one_line_profile: Variant effect prediction plugin for Kipoi
tools.detailed_description: kipoi-veff is a plugin for the Kipoi model zoo that enables standard variant effect prediction (VEP) across various genomic deep learning models hosted on Kipoi.

tools.name: fastISM
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated In-silico Saturation Mutagenesis
tools.detailed_description: fastISM provides a highly optimized implementation for performing In-silico Saturation Mutagenesis (ISM) on convolutional neural networks, significantly speeding up the interpretation of genomic models.

tools.name: yuzu
tools.one_line_profile: Compressed-sensing based In-silico Mutagenesis
tools.detailed_description: yuzu is a tool for rapidly calculating in-silico mutagenesis saliency maps using compressed sensing techniques, enabling efficient interpretation of sequence-based deep learning models.

tools.name: DiMSum
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing Deep Mutational Scanning data
tools.detailed_description: DiMSum (Deep Mutational Scanning of U M) is an error model and pipeline for analyzing DMS data. It estimates variant fitness and associated errors, diagnosing experimental pathologies.

tools.name: MoCHI
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable modeling of Deep Mutational Scanning data
tools.detailed_description: MoCHI uses neural networks to fit interpretable thermodynamic models to DMS data, quantifying energies, couplings, epistasis, and allostery directly from high-throughput measurements.

tools.name: Tranception
tools.one_line_profile: Protein fitness prediction using autoregressive transformers and retrieval
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Tranception, a state-of-the-art model for protein fitness prediction that combines autoregressive transformers with retrieval-based inference to capture evolutionary information.

tools.name: AlphaMissenseR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for AlphaMissense data resources
tools.detailed_description: AlphaMissenseR provides an R interface to access and analyze pathogenicity predictions from AlphaMissense, facilitating the integration of these predictions into genomic workflows.

tools.name: rosace
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical inference for growth-based Deep Mutational Scanning
tools.detailed_description: Rosace performs statistical inference on growth-based deep mutational scanning screens. It models the growth dynamics to estimate fitness effects and their uncertainties.

tools.name: MSA Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model for unsupervised sequence modeling and contact prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based protein language model that operates on Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSAs) to capture co-evolutionary information, enabling state-of-the-art unsupervised contact prediction and fitness estimation.

tools.name: bio_embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating protein embeddings from various language models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library providing a unified interface to generate, visualize, and analyze protein embeddings from state-of-the-art protein language models (e.g., ProtTrans, SeqVec, ESM).

tools.name: ProVis
tools.one_line_profile: Visual analysis tool for interpreting attention mechanisms in protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to interpret and visualize the attention maps of protein language models (BERTology), helping to understand how these models capture biological features like contact maps and binding sites.

tools.name: D-SCRIPT
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for structure-aware protein-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable deep learning method for predicting protein-protein interactions (PPIs) from sequence data, incorporating structural awareness to improve prediction accuracy and physical plausibility.

tools.name: CPT
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-protein transfer learning framework for variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method leveraging cross-protein transfer learning to improve the prediction of variant effects, particularly useful for proteins with limited homologous sequence data.

tools.name: Factored Attention
tools.one_line_profile: Method for interpreting protein language models via factored attention analysis
tools.detailed_description: Code and methodology for interpreting Potts models and Transformer-based protein models by factoring attention matrices, enabling the extraction of structural and functional insights from learned representations.

tools.name: SARS-CoV-2-RBD-Abs-HTDMS
tools.one_line_profile: Data processing pipeline for high-throughput deep mutational scanning
tools.detailed_description: A specialized bioinformatics pipeline for processing high-throughput deep mutational scanning (DMS) data, specifically designed for analyzing SARS-CoV-2 RBD antibody escape mutations.

tools.name: ProMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal deep learning model for zero-shot mutation effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that combines sequence and structural information to predict the functional effects of protein mutations in a zero-shot manner, without requiring labeled training data for the specific protein.

tools.name: Deep Mutational Scan Evaluation
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and evaluation framework for deep mutational scanning models
tools.detailed_description: A unified evaluation framework and data collection for benchmarking computational models against Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) experiments, facilitating the comparison of variant effect prediction methods.

tools.name: dms-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for processing high-throughput deep mutational scanning data
tools.detailed_description: A data processing pipeline designed for high-throughput deep mutational scanning (DMS) of monoclonal antibodies (mAbs), handling raw sequencing data to generate mutation enrichment scores.
